spec_data.Name: python3-hupper
spec_data.Description:
hupper is an integrated process monitor that will track changes
to any imported Python files in sys.modules as well as custom paths.
When files are changed the process is restarted.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 01:27:47 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Integrated process monitor for developing servers
